name: gcp-talk-to-your-data
postCreateCommand: ./startupscript/post-startup.sh jovyan /home/jovyan "${templateOption:cloud}" "${templateOption:login}" && pip install -q -r /workspace/requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || true && chmod +x /workspace/setup-notebook.sh 2>/dev/null || true && /workspace/setup-notebook.sh 2>/dev/null || true && (cp /workspace/Lab_Results_Analysis.ipynb /home/jovyan/ 2>/dev/null || curl -s -o /home/jovyan/Lab_Results_Analysis.ipynb https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SIVerilyDP/workbench-app-devcontainers/master/src/gcp-talk-to-your-data/Lab_Results_Analysis.ipynb) && cp /workspace/GCP_Data_Profiling_and_Chat.ipynb /home/jovyan/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp /workspace/gcp_tools.py /home/jovyan/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp /workspace/requirements.txt /home/jovyan/ 2>/dev/null || true && chown -R jovyan:users /home/jovyan/*.ipynb /home/jovyan/gcp_tools.py /home/jovyan/requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || true
